name: Bomb Escape
description:
Bomb Escape is a game of skill and reflex, developed by just one person, in which the player must be able to dodge bombs, collect coins and score as many points as possible in the Arena.

Unlock characters and find the one that best suits your playing style.

Test your skills and prove that your quick thinking and your skills will make you the best Bomb Escape player.

Try to stay as long as possible in the arena.
Can you do it?
